text:
Small business tip: responsiveness builds trust. 

Preston, our #AI Agent Receptionist, can greet callers and capture requests when your team is unavailable — so no call feels ignored.  

Learn more about Preston: https://t.co/VkpMxgFFdp https://t.co/fJvKk5WRYj
These two entrepreneurial undergraduates created an #AI product to solve a common small business challenge. https://t.co/5fvwe8HXgY https://t.co/t5rYd2M8uR

Your receptionist costs $3,000/month. AI receptionists cost $99/month, answer 24/7, never call in sick, and book appointments while you sleep. Small business owners are slow to adopt this. That's your advantage.
author_name: Jonatan | Ai Expert for Small Businesses
